rationale: Describes past findings ('virus was able to reach', 'no evidence... person-to-person transmitted') related to scientific understanding/capability without explicit calming keywords.
statement_text: The virus was able to reach receptor sites and cells deeper in the respiratory tract and cause human infection. And it [the human infection] was obviously a severe issue. But even then [even at that time], we had no evidence these [these cases] were person-to-person transmitted cases.
